name: Carlos Mendoza
description: Carlos is a 68-year-old retired teacher from Mexico, who has embraced technology with an expert's touch despite his limited mobility. Outgoing and relaxed, he enjoys connecting with family and friends through video calls, as it allows him to maintain personal relationships in a stylized, casual manner. His intuitive decision-making and patient nature make him well-suited to learning new tech, and he is particularly eager to master video calling to keep in touch with his loved ones.

task_profile.task: teach my parent to use video calls
